N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 580.13 - Consolidation, severance and failure of notice

State Regulations

The hearing officer shall have power concerning
consolidation, severance and failure of notice to make such order as justice
requires. Upon his own motion and upon motion of any party, he may order a
joint hearing of any or all matters in issue involving common questions of
fact. He may, jointly with any other agency hearing officer, order
consolidation of hearings, and may make any other orders as may tend to avoid
delay. He may order a severance of the hearing and may order separate hearings
in respect to any issue. Notes
